sect1.title: Feedback
sect1.para: Several channels are available to provide feedback:

listitem.para: Feel welcome to file a Bug Report or a Feature Request.
To create a bug or a feature request: https://github.com/saigkill/latex_curriculum_vitae-dotnet/issues.

For feedback on the project or its documentation, you can also send a direct email to Sascha.Manns@outlook.de. Please include the document title, the product version, and the publication date of the documentation. To report errors or suggest enhancements, provide a concise description of the problem and refer to the respective section number and page (or URL).
